title: Let's Stay Together Itsumo (Fruits Basket OST)
lyrics: To te mo uresh ikatta yo kimi ga warai kaketeta Sub Sub et et e wo tokasu hohoemi de Ha ru w a mada tookute tsumetai tsuchi no naka de Meb Meb uk uk u toki wo mattetanda Tat Tat oeba kurushii kyou dato shite mo Kin Kin ou no kizu wo nokoshiteite mo Shinj it ai kok oro hodoite yukeru to Uma Uma re kawaru koto wa dekinai yo Dak Dak edo kawatte wa ikeru kara Let Let 's stay together itsumo    Bo ku d ake ni waratte sono yubi de nee sawatte Noz Noz om om i bakari ga hateshinaku Ya sa sh iku sh itai yo mou kuyamanu you ni Nag Nag ek ek i no umi mo koete ikou Tat Tat oe kurushii kyou dato shite mo Its Its uka atataka na omoide ni naru Kokor o- goto s ubete nagedaseta nara Kok Kok o ni ikiteru imi ga wakaru yo Uma Uma re ochita yorokobi wo shiru Let Let 's stay together itsumo           Tat Tat oeba kurushii kyou dato shite mo Its Its uka atataka na omoide ni naru Kokor o- goto s ubete nagedaseta nara Kok Kok o ni ikiteru imi ga wakaru yo Uma Uma re ochita yorokobi wo shiru Let Let 's stay together itsumo
